title: Janna Levin: Black Holes, Wormholes, Aliens, Paradoxes & Extra Dimensions | Lex Fridman Podcast #468

metadata.summary: In this episode, Janna Levin, a theoretical physicist and cosmologist, joins Lex Fridman to delve into a wide array of fascinating topics. They explore the nature of black holes, including their formation, the physics of spacetime, and the information paradox. The conversation extends to wormholes, extra dimensions, and the search for extraterrestrial life. Levin and Fridman also touch upon dark matter, gravitational waves, and the groundbreaking work of scientists like Alan Turing and Grigori Perelman, while also discussing the intersection of art and science and the biggest mysteries of the universe.

topClaims.text: Quantum mechanics does not allow quantum information to simply evaporate away and poof out of the universe and cease to exist.
The ability for humans to create the means for their own destruction is a strong indication of their evolutionary advancement.
Everything everybody has ever seen and ever will see makes up less than 5% of what's out there.

topQuotes.text: Quantum mechanics does not allow quantum information to simply evaporate away and poof out of the universe.
It seems like us being able to destroy ourselves is a really powerful way to give us a chance to really get our act together and to flourish.
Everything everybody has ever seen and ever will see, as far as we understand, makes up less than 5% of what's out there.

topTopics.name: spacetime physics
topTopics.description: The nature of space and time

topTopics.name: alien life
topTopics.description: The search for life beyond Earth

localized.description:
Janna Levin is a theoretical physicist and cosmologist specializing in black holes, cosmology of extra dimensions, topology of the universe, and gravitational waves.
Thank you for listening ❤ Check out our sponsors: https://lexfridman.com/sponsors/ep468-sb
See below for timestamps, and to give feedback, submit questions, contact Lex, etc.

*CONTACT LEX:*
*Feedback* - give feedback to Lex: https://lexfridman.com/survey
*AMA* - submit questions, videos or call-in: https://lexfridman.com/ama
*Hiring* - join our team: https://lexfridman.com/hiring
*Other* - other ways to get in touch: https://lexfridman.com/contact

*EPISODE LINKS:*
Janna's X: https://x.com/JannaLevin
Janna's Website: https://jannalevin.com
Janna's Instagram: https://instagram.com/jannalevin
Janna's Substack: https://substack.com/@jannalevin
Black Hole Survival Guide (book): https://amzn.to/3YkJzT5
Black Hole Blues (book): https://amzn.to/42Nw7IE
How the Universe Got Its Spots (book): https://amzn.to/4m5De8k
A Madman Dreams of Turing Machines (book): https://amzn.to/3GGakvd

metadata.shortSummary: Janna Levin discusses black holes, wormholes, extra dimensions, and the mysteries of the universe with Lex Fridman, exploring topics from gravitational waves to the potential for alien life.
